name: Sang Ho Yoon
content: Welcome to HCI Tech Lab! We are a multidisciplinary research group working on physical computing, natural user interface, and socially acceptable interactions. Our research focuses on enabling novel interactions for Extended Reality (XR) through sensing/haptic feedback technology and wearable interface with the aid of applied machine learning while supporting intelligent authoring systems. We envision natural user interactions that overcome physical, mental, and social barriers.
